ValidationRule.description: One of the fields : Product sku or Product sku unknown is mandatory if the type of the case = Product information or category = repair and car advice or Personalization
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( (ISBLANK( Product_Sku_unknown__c )), (ISBLANK ( Product_Sku__c )), NOT($User.BypassVR__c), OR( ISPICKVAL ( Category__c , "Availability"), ISPICKVAL( Category__c , "Price"), ISPICKVAL ( Category__c , "Characteristics"), ISPICKVAL ( Category__c , "Reservation")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Resolution__c , "")), NOT ( Spam__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Note: Please complete mandatory fields: Product sku or Unknown product designation
